title: E2: Women Needed
description:
With John von Neumann absorbed in work, Klári struggles to find a niche in her new suburban home while dealing with devastating losses. A new chapter opens for Klári when the U.S. finally enters the war and women are called into the workforce.

Access a transcript of the episode here: https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/lost-women-of-science-podcast-season-2-episode-two-women-needed/
itunes:subtitle: Klári von Neumann arrives in Princeton just as war breaks out in Europe.
author: lostwomenofscience@gmail.com (Lost Women of Science)
